dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3305 IH: Bikeshare Transit Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Blumenauer (for himself and Mr. Buchanan) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend titles 23 and 49, United States Code, with respect to bikeshare projects, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Bikeshare Transit Act of 2017.
Section 5302 of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking and the installation and inserting , the installation; and

by inserting before the semicolon the following: , and bikeshare projects, including any project or activity carried out to facilitate a bicycle rental operation that makes bicycles available for public transportation, allows riders to pick up and drop off bicycles, serves a defined geographic area, and facilitates the transit of individuals between various points in such geographic area; and
in subparagraph (M) by striking or at the end;
in subparagraph (N) by striking the period at the end and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:

the acquisition or replacement of bicycles and related equipment, including technology and vehicles needed to restock stations, and the construction of bicycle-related facilities to facilitate a bikeshare project.

section.header: Congestion mitigation and air quality improvement program eligible projects
section.text: Section 149(b)(7) of title 23, United States Code, is amended by inserting bikesharing, after carsharing,.
